flawed_nl_solution:
The second student guessed 8000 because 8 x 100 = <<8000=8000>>8000
The third guessed 7800 because 8000 - 200 = <<8000-200=7800>>7800
The total guesses of the first three is 15900 because 100 + 8000 + 7800 = <<100+8000+7800=15900>>15900
The average of the first three guesses is 5300 because 15900 / 3 = <<15900/3=5300>>5300
The fourth student guessed 5325 because 5300 + 25 = <<5300+25=5325>>5325
#### 5325

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 8000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
